Producer: Geno Taylor, Missy Valdez, Elie Samaha, Wesley Snipes, Tiffany Haddish, Donald Kushner, Jeru Tillman, Chris Spencer, Eric Daniel
Synopsis: After losing the woman of his dreams, Merlin moves to Las Vegas to pursue work as a magician, only to get hired as the front man in a revival of the notorious Black male stripper crew, The Chocolate Chips. Led by Luther -- now broke and broken -- the old, domesticated, out-of-shape Chips put aside former conflicts and reunite to save the hotel they used to perform in while helping Merlin win back his girl.
Title: Back on the Strip
